name: Yannick Dawant
bio: I've been using Python professionally for the past 5 years. I was lucky to be surrounded by great teachers and mentors on my path to becoming a developer. Excited to pay that forward!

name: Ty Hahn
bio: I do Linux administration as day job and write python mainly for my personal data science projects.

name: Michael Morehouse
bio: Although Python wasn't my first -- and won't be my last -- programming language, it remains my favorite for introducing others to the joys, the pains, the infrequent ecstacies, and the occasional terrors of life before the REPL.
